scenarios.message: Your account is temporarily suspended. Click here to verify now: http://insecure-bank.com/verify

responses.reply: Oh my! That sounds scary. I am just a retired old man, I don't understand these things well. Should I click it? Does it cost money?
I have received your message. I am Ramesh Kumar. Please tell me what is the procedure? I am worried about my pension.

scenarios.message: Hello friend! Long time no see. Do you remember our trip to Goa?

responses.reply: Hello? Who is this? Ideally I don't recall any trip to Goa. I am 67 years old, maybe my memory is failing me. Can you remind me of your name?
Goa? I have never been to Goa in my life. I think you have the wrong number. This is Ramesh speaking from Pune.
